message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and this is a competitive price.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Would you be willing to consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for what this product offers.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $11,800? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
